title: New Star Foodservice 50844 Pizza Pan / Tray, Coupe Style, Aluminum, 18 inch
feature: QUALITY - Commercial grade aluminum. No coating to flake off.
CONVENIENT - Prepare, bake, slice and serve - all in the same pan!
EASY TO CLEAN - Hand wash to maintain its finish. May oxidize in the dishwasher.
CHOICE OF SIZES & STYLES - 7 sizes, from 8 - 20 inch, coupe style or wide rim, also available in packs of 6.
EDGE - Gently sloped edge allows toppings to completely cover crust without spilling over. Great for people who don't like crust, or want a little more.
description: Serve your freshly baked thin crust pizzas with style in these restaurant quality coupe style pizza trays from New Star Foodservice. These durable and thin 18 inch aluminum trays were made for you to take your pizza baking and serving skills right to the edge. Check out more pizza trays, screens, and other New Star pizza products sold on Amazon.
